Hi Stack,
do you may read the posting on the serverside.com as well there is a  
new version of apache Mina out.
http://directory.apache.org/subprojects/network/
This tools really looks interesting:

http://wiki.apache.org/directory/MinaTutorial
BUT:
JMX managability, (coming soon)
:-/

Greetings,
Stefan 
--Apple-Mail-1--514385388
